sentences.sContent: He shook his head slowly and deliberately.
sentences.sCn: 他缓缓而慎重地摇摇头。

sentences.sContent: ...fires deliberately set by frontier settlers and developers hurl up almost half a billion metric tons of carbon a year...
...he positions his instruments in a way that is deliberately inconvenient...
...Obstacles deliberately placed in the creation of music contribute to its success...

words.tran: 故意的；深思熟虑的；从容的

trans.tranOther: done in a way that is intended or planned
